title: [GAMEPLAY] Project Ashe
body:
**[GAMEPLAY] ASHE AUTOATTACK WITH RUNAANS HURRICANE**

When i auto-attack while having runaans there is a visual bug that the auto attack animation comming from the yellow sphere and it is the normal yellow bolts instead of the project arrows. 
When using Q and autoattacking seems that the arrows animation are back to the project ones are they should be.

I have tryed it in about 3 games. There not much things to do to encounter it other than having runaans.

replies.body:
Hey CutiePieHro! 

Thanks for the report! 

The AA particle for PROJECT: Ashe when she's using Runaan's Hurricane should be using yellow particles. The only time it will be blue is if she has her (Q) active.  In that instance, the particles will be blue.
